1470213115820183558.full_text: Dec.13th,2021 is China’s eighth National Memorial Day for the #NanjingMassacre Victims. 84 years ago, more than 300,000 people were killed during Japan’s invasion of the eastern Chinese city of Nanjing in a span of six weeks. Commemorations will be held across the country. https://t.co/VKdPnp2fvP
